info.name: Silph Core API
info.description: Auto-generated Postman collection from NestJS controllers in silph-core repository

request.description: Health check endpoint - returns API status
Comprehensive health check for the system (database, redis, memory)

item.name: POST /auth/login - Login with email and password

exec: console.log("Detectado flujo Multi-tenant. Seteando tempToken y primer tenantId.");
// Seleccionamos el primer tenant por defecto para automatizar,
// pero podr√≠as cambiarlo manualmente en la variable de entorno
// Limpiamos el access_token viejo para evitar confusiones
console.log("Detectado flujo Single-tenant. Seteando access_token final.");

request.description: Validates credentials. Returns JWT, tenant selection, or MFA_REQUIRED

item.name: POST /auth/select-tenant - Select tenant and complete login

request.description: Exchanges tempToken and selected tenantId for the final JWT
Google OAuth callback; returns JWT or redirects to frontend

item.name: POST /auth/oauth/exchange - Exchange OAuth code for JWT
GET /auth/me - Get current user from JWT

variable.description: Target tenant ID to switch to
Target tenant ID to switch to

response.name: 401 - Unauthorize

variable.description: Target tenant ID to switch to

response.name: 200 - Success
404 - Not Found

request.description: Get all email logs (Super Admin only)

response.name: 400 - Bad Request
403 - Forbidden

request.description: Get tenant by slug (Public) - Used during login flow

response.name: 403 - Forbidden

item.name: GET /tenants/check-slug/{slug} - Check if a slug is available

request.description: Check if a slug is available (Public)

response.name: 409 - Conflict
200 - Success
